verses.name: Acts 5:37
verses.text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing, and drew away much people after him: he also perished; and all, even as many as obeyed him, were dispersed.

verses.name: Acts 5:38
verses.text: And now I say unto you, Refrain from these men, and let them alone: for if this counsel or this work be of men, it will come to nought:

verses.name: Acts 5:39
verses.text: But if it be of God, ye cannot overthrow it; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God.
